main event: City officials observed a bright light moving rapidly overhead in Oklahoma City, 1962.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at about 10:35 PM on September 7, 1962., The object was round, disc-shaped, and approximately 20-25 feet in diameter., The officials watched the object for about a minute., It was moving west at an estimated speed of 500 mph., The object was glowing with a whitish light and was not a conventional aircraft.
sighted object: a round, disc-shaped object glowing with whitish light
